verses.text: \w Save|strong="H3467"\w* me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in unto \add my\add* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

I \w sink|strong="H2883"\w* in \w deep|strong="H4688"\w* \w mire|strong="H3121"\w*, where \add there is\add* no \w standing|strong="H4613"\w*: I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, where the \w floods|strong="H7641"\w* \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* me.\f + \fr 69.2 \ft deep mire: Heb. the mire of depth\f*\f + \fr 69.2 \ft deep waters: Heb. depth of waters\f*

I am \w weary|strong="H3021"\w* of my \w crying|strong="H7121"\w*: my \w throat|strong="H1627"\w* is \w dried|strong="H2787"\w*: mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* while I \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* for my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

They that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me without a \w cause|strong="H2600"\w* are \w more|strong="H7231"\w* than the \w hairs|strong="H8185"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: they that would \w destroy|strong="H6789"\w* me, \add being\add* mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w wrongfully|strong="H8267"\w*, are \w mighty|strong="H6105"\w*: then I \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \add that\add* which I took not \w away|strong="H1497"\w*.

O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* my \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w*; and my \w sins|strong="H0819"\w* are not \w hid|strong="H3582"\w* from thee.\f + \fr 69.5 \ft sins: Heb. guiltiness\f*

Let not them that \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* on thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* for my sake: let not those that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thee be \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* for my sake, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
Because for thy sake I have \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*; \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.
I am become a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* unto my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and an \w alien|strong="H5237"\w* unto my \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

For the \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* of thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* hath eaten me \w up|strong="H0398"\w*; and the \w reproaches|strong="H2781"\w* of them that \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* thee are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* upon me.
When I \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \add and chastened\add* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* with \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w*, that was to my \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.
I \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* also my \w garment|strong="H3830"\w*; and I became a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* to them.

They that sit \w in|strong="H3427"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w speak|strong="H7878"\w* against me; and I \add was\add* the \w song|strong="H5058"\w* of the \w drunkards|strong="H8354"\w*.\f + \fr 69.12 \ft drunkards: Heb. drinkers of strong drink\f*

But as for me, my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \add is\add* unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add in\add* an \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me, in the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* of thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me out of the \w mire|strong="H2916"\w*, and let me not \w sink|strong="H2883"\w*: let me be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* from them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me, and out of the \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

Let not the \w waterflood|strong="H4325"\w* \w overflow|strong="H7857"\w* me, neither let the \w deep|strong="H4688"\w* swallow me \w up|strong="H1104"\w*, and let not the \w pit|strong="H0875"\w* \w shut|strong="H0332"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* upon me.

\w Hear|strong="H6030"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* unto me according to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of thy tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*.

And \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* not thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*; for I am in \w trouble|strong="H6887"\w*: \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me \w speedily|strong="H4118"\w*.\f + \fr 69.17 \ft hear…: Heb. make haste to hear me\f*
Draw \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* unto my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \add and\add* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* it: \w deliver|strong="H6299"\w* me because of mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

Thou hast \w known|strong="H3045"\w* my \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*, and my \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*, and my \w dishonour|strong="H3639"\w*: mine \w adversaries|strong="H6887"\w* \add are\add* all before thee.

\w Reproach|strong="H2781"\w* hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; and I am full of \w heaviness|strong="H5136"\w*: and I \w looked|strong="H6960"\w* \add for some\add* to take \w pity|strong="H5110"\w*, but \add there was\add* none; and for \w comforters|strong="H5162"\w*, but I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* none.\f + \fr 69.20 \ft to take…: Heb. to lament with me\f*

They \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* me also \w gall|strong="H7219"\w* for my \w meat|strong="H1267"\w*; and in my \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w* they gave me \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

Let their \w table|strong="H7979"\w* become a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them: and \add that which should have been\add* for \add their\add* \w welfare|strong="H7965"\w*, \add let it become\add* a \w trap|strong="H4170"\w*.

Let their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* be \w darkened|strong="H2821"\w*, that they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not; and make their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* to \w shake|strong="H4571"\w*.
Pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* thine \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* upon them, and let thy \w wrathful|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* take \w hold|strong="H5381"\w* of them.

Let their \w habitation|strong="H2918"\w* be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*; \add and\add* let none \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 69.25 \ft their habitation: Heb. their palace\f*\f + \fr 69.25 \ft let none…: Heb. let there not be a dweller\f*

For they \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \add him\add* whom thou hast \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*; and they \w talk|strong="H5608"\w* to the \w grief|strong="H4341"\w* of those whom thou hast \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w*.\f + \fr 69.26 \ft those…: Heb. thy wounded\f*

\w Add|strong="H5414"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* unto their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: and let them not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.\f + \fr 69.27 \ft iniquity unto…: or, punishment of iniquity, etc\f*
Let them be \w blotted|strong="H4229"\w* out of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, and not be \w written|strong="H3789"\w* with the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.
But I \add am\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w sorrowful|strong="H3510"\w*: let thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, set me up on \w high|strong="H7682"\w*.

I will \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with a \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, and will \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* him with \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*.

\add This\add* also shall \w please|strong="H3190"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w better|strong="H3190"\w* than an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \add or\add* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* that hath \w horns|strong="H7160"\w* and \w hoofs|strong="H6536"\w*.

The \w humble|strong="H6035"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add this, and\add* be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*: and your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 69.32 \ft humble: or, meek\f*
For the \nd  \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*, and \w despiseth|strong="H0959"\w* not his \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w*.

Let the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* him, the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, and every thing that \w moveth|strong="H7430"\w* therein.\f + \fr 69.34 \ft moveth: Heb. creepeth\f*

For \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: that they may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there, and have it in \w possession|strong="H3423"\w*.

The \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* also of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* it: and they that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* therein.
